component.name: GNUmed EMR
component.summary: An Electronic Medical Record for community care

description.p: GNUmed enables doctors to keep a medically sound record on their patients' health. It does not currently provide functionality for stock keeping. Clinical features are well-tested by real doctors in the field.

While the GNUmed team has taken the utmost care to make sure the medical records are safe at all times you still need to make sure you are taking appropriate steps to backup medical data to a safe place at appropriate intervals. Do not forget to test your recovery procedures, too !
Protect your data! GNUmed itself comes without any warranty whatsoever. You have been warned.
